kw.name: Open Application Browser
kw.doc: Ouvre Chrome sans Password Manager ni popups Google.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Login As Standard User
kw.doc: Connecte l'utilisateur avec le compte standard et attend que la page des produits soit chargée.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Reset Application State
kw.doc: Réinitialise l'état de l'application via le menu burger et vérifie que le panier est vide.

kw.name: Open Burger Menu
kw.doc: Ouvre le menu burger et attend que toutes les options soient visibles.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Does Not Contain
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` does not contain ``text``.

kw.name: Close Burger Menu
kw.doc: Ferme le menu burger en cliquant sur le bouton X et attend que le menu disparaisse.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
